name: @waldzellai/adk-typescript
description: TypeScript SDK for Google Agent Development Kit (ADK) - A comprehensive framework for building AI agents

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.lint:claude: claude -p 'You are a TypeScript code quality reviewer. Analyze the provided files for type safety issues, anti-patterns, and code quality problems. Focus on: 1) Removing any types, 2) Proper error handling, 3) TypeScript best practices, 4) Performance concerns. Provide specific line-by-line feedback with actionable recommendations.' --output-format json
scripts.verify:claude: npm run lint 2>&1 | claude -p 'Analyze these ESLint errors for an ADK TypeScript project. Categorize by severity and provide a fix priority ranking with specific remediation steps.' --output-format text
scripts.quality:gate: npm run verify:types && npm run test && npm run lint && echo 'âœ… All quality gates passed'

author: WaldzellAI
